name: Fractured American Idol 2003 Quiz | Fractured TV | 10 Questions

questions.explanation:
Randy Jackson.

	The middle-of-the road judge in terms of kindness, he had lost a good deal of weight in time for American Idol 3.

Ryan Seacrest.

	The show's handsome, cheerful host.

Carmen Rasmussen & Carmen Rasmusen.

	A cute blonde, Carmen was the youngest finalist, 17 at the time.

Clay Aiken.

	The first runner up, skinny Clay has hedgehog hair and a BIG beautiful voice. He's from North Carolina.

questions.text: Jewel Leigh yaw tomato? (Pronounce "tomato" with a British accent.)
questions.correct: Julia DeMato & Julia De Mato & Julia DaMato & Julia Da Mato
questions.explanation:
Julia DeMato & Julia De Mato & Julia DaMato & Julia Da Mato.

	Pretty Julia was one of the first finalists to go.

Ruben Studdard.

	The winner! Ruben is a huge guy with a huge velvety voice. He's from Alabama.

Paula Abdul.

	Beautiful, charming Paula is the sweet motherly judge of the three (though in AI 3 her darker side seemed to be emerging).

Kimberly Caldwell & Kimberley Caldwell.

	One of the two Kimberlies among the finalists, Caldwell was the first to go. She took a job as a sportscaster, I'm told.

Trenyce.

	Like Cher and Prince before her, beautiful Trenyce has a one-word name.

Kimberly Locke & Kimberley Locke.

	The lovely Ms. Locke, a law student, was the second runner-up.
